Content:
[Jennifer Gentry, PhD](https://www.vanderbilt.edu/cseo/who-we-are/staff/) Led the project; developed and researched storylines; drafted Lessons 1-4.

[Stephanie Rapciak, MA](https://www.linkedin.com/in/stephanie-rapciak/) Researched and undertook transformative revisions of all lesson materials.

[Ranida McKneally, MLA](https://www.linkedin.com/in/rmckneally/) Led the development and drafting of Lesson 5. Provided feedback on all lesson parts.

[Stephanie Castillo, PhD](https://www.phuturedoctors.com/) Co-wrote, storyboarded, filmed, edited, and starred in Lesson 2 video "What makes a video go viral? Emergence!"

[Sarah Grasty, MS](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sarah-grasty-988676b0/) Provided feedback, editorial revisions, and strategic input throughout development.

[Albert Kao, PhD](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=hZhwjsIAAAAJ) Defined outreach goals; provided feedback throughout development; provided scientific validation of lesson content.

[Matt Wilkins, PhD](https://mattwilkinsbio.com) Directed the project; helped develop, edit, and revise all aspects of the lesson
